title: Enhance cyberpunk styling with glowing card-style poster and updated branding

requirements.text: Transform the Holi Grail poster into a card-style booking component with cyberpunk neon glow effects, border highlighting, and elevated card styling that matches the existing neon green (#39FF14) and hot pink (#FF69B4) color scheme

quotes: make the holi grail poster like a card style booking tab, add some light, glow to it to match with the cyber punk look that were going with

acceptanceCriteria: Holi Grail poster is displayed as a prominent card component with defined borders
Card has neon glow effect using CSS box-shadow or border-glow animations
Styling uses the existing cyberpunk color palette (neon green #39FF14 and hot pink #FF69B4)
Card has elevated/raised appearance with proper depth and shadow effects

requirements.text: Relocate the MonkeyWorx logo to the top of the page as the primary branding element and add neon glow effects that match the cyberpunk aesthetic

quotes: monkeyworx logo has to go on top, its the branding of the company a representation and you can add neon glow to it to match the style

acceptanceCriteria: MonkeyWorx logo is positioned at the top of the page (in hero section or navigation)
Logo has neon glow effect applied (CSS filter, text-shadow, or drop-shadow)
Logo remains prominent and clearly visible as the primary brand identifier
Glow effect uses colors from the cyberpunk palette (neon green or hot pink)

requirements.text: Adapt the Holi Grail poster design to full cyberpunk styling with improved color arrangement and visibility, ensuring text and elements stand out against the dark background

quotes: adapt the poster to the cyberpunk style, arrange song colors as the front page sub heading words are not scene, keep the background dark

acceptanceCriteria: Poster maintains dark background consistent with matte black (#000000) theme
All text elements have sufficient contrast and are clearly readable
Color scheme uses neon green and hot pink accents throughout the poster
Layout and typography follow industrial cyberpunk aesthetic with monospaced or industrial fonts

requirements.text: Fix front page subheading text visibility issues by improving color contrast and ensuring all text elements are clearly readable against the dark background

quotes: arrange song colors as the front page sub heading words are not scene

acceptanceCriteria: All subheading text in the hero section is clearly visible
Text color provides sufficient contrast ratio against dark background (WCAG AA minimum)
Neon color accents enhance readability rather than obscure it
No text is hidden or blends into the background

requirements.text: Update the Swiggy Scenes ticket booking link from the current URL to https://r.swiggy.com/v1/swiggy/scenes/comms/100052615 across all booking CTAs

quotes: here's a link for the tickets : https://r.swiggy.com/v1/swiggy/scenes/comms/100052615

acceptanceCriteria: All Swiggy booking buttons and CTAs link to https://r.swiggy.com/v1/swiggy/scenes/comms/100052615
Links open in a new tab with proper security attributes (rel='noopener noreferrer')
No broken or outdated Swiggy booking links remain in the codebase

requirements.text: Add the Instagram handle @monkeyworxcollective to the footer social media section and ensure it links to the correct Instagram profile

quotes: the instagram id for the company is @monkeyworxcollective

acceptanceCriteria: Instagram icon in the footer links to https://instagram.com/monkeyworxcollective
Link opens in a new tab with proper security attributes
Instagram handle is displayed or accessible via hover/tooltip if needed
Icon styling matches existing social media icons in the footer

constraints: Maintain the existing matte black (#000000) background throughout the site
Use only neon green (#39FF14) and hot pink (#FF69B4) for accent colors and glow effects
Preserve the industrial cyberpunk aesthetic with monospaced and industrial fonts
Do not modify the backend/main.mo file as all functionality is frontend-only
Keep the existing glitch animation effects and scanline overlays
Maintain responsive design and mobile menu functionality
nonGoals: Changing the overall color scheme beyond the specified neon green and hot pink
Adding new sections or pages beyond the existing structure
Implementing backend functionality or database integration
Adding new ticket tiers or pricing changes
Modifying team member information or corporate services list
Changing the fundamental layout structure of existing sections

edits: Add cyberpunk neon glow effects to the MonkeyWorx logo with enhanced contrast (monkeyworx-logo.png > monkeyworx-logo-neon.png)
Transform Holi Grail poster into card-style design with neon border glow and improved text visibility (holi-grail-poster.png > holi-grail-card.png)
